hef.IRCTransport
Class IrcAgent

java.lang.Object
  org.pircbotx.PircBotX
      hef.IRCTransport.IrcAgent

public class IrcAgent
extends org.pircbotx.PircBotX

Represent a player to an IRC server. Every Bukkit player should have one! Every agent will have channels, a player, and an active channel.

Method Detail

connect

public void connect()
             throws IOException,
                    org.pircbotx.exception.IrcException
Connect the agent. Don't call this directly, call `new Connect(this).run()` instead.

Throws:
IOException - If it was not possible to connect to the server.
org.pircbotx.exception.IrcException - If the server would not let us join it.

getActiveChannel

public org.pircbotx.Channel getActiveChannel()
Fetch the active channel. The active channel is the channel that a player will talk in if they don't specify a channel.

Returns:
a string with the active channel name.
